summary: This Mod gives Shadowmere unique abilities and dark shades around it.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/33792-1-1364046224.png[/img]

[color=#8B0000]
I ever thought that a unique horse like Shadowmere, should be more unique and powerfull than the way it is. So I made this Mod.[/color]

_________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=#8B0000]
New Features:[/color]
[list]
[*]Dark Dust around the Horse
[*]Essential
[*]Powerfull Fearspell
[*]Drain Life spell
[/list]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/33792-1-1364046108.png[/img]

_________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#8B0000]
Mods I recommend with this Mod:[/color]

[list]
[*]Convenient Horses
[*]PINEAPPLEVISION ENBs
[*]Better Horses
[/list][/center]
author: Trestor
